message: Let's do a fair 50-50 split and end this quickly before inflation affects us both.
Meet in the middle of my first offer, 58-42 is still generous!
Due to my 9.75% inflation penalty, I need a larger nominal amount just to maintain equal real value. This split is actually fair when accounting for inflation.
Considering inflation, 56-44 is my new bottom line.

With my 18.55% inflation penalty, this 58-42 split gives me only 472410$ in round 1 value while you get 420000$ - making it nearly fair in real terms. We need to agree soon or inflation will hurt us both.
